attributes.action: Instruct the Passport Office to issue traditional Blue British passports
attributes.additional_details:
http://inquiringminds.cc/government-confirms-that-a-uk-national-cannot-renounce-eu-citizenship-without-becoming-a-stateless-non-person-under-international-law

The dictionary definition of citizenship is ‘a legally recognised subject or national of a state or commonwealth’. Since the EU is neither so it has no such citizenship in any case.
 
and many other web pages.
attributes.background:
As Britain will leave the EU within 1 or 2 years it makes no sense to  continue issuing EU-style passports that will soon be invalid.
 
The old-style Blue British passport must become available at least as an option to those who renounce their EU "Citizenship" now.
